PgmBasedHlthRskAdjFctr.name: PgmBasedHlthRskAdjFctr
PgmBasedHlthRskAdjFctr.description: Stores the risk adjustment factor for patients and members based on their eligibility for certain benefits programs. For instance, Medicaid in the US.

CmnyFullBnftDualDisabled.description: Specifies the risk adjustment factor for a patient who lives at home, has full benefits from both Medicare and Medicaid, and is enrolled in Medicare because of a disability.

CmnyPartialBenefitDualAged.description: Specifies the risk adjustment factor for a patient who lives at home, has partial benefits from both Medicare and Medicaid, and is enrolled in Medicare because of their age.

CmnyPartialBnftDualDsbl.description: Specifies the risk adjustment factor for a patient who lives at home, has partial benefits from both Medicare and Medicaid, and is enrolled in Medicare because of a disability.

Community.description: Specifies the risk adjustment factor for a patient who lives at home.

CommunityFullBnftDualAged.description: Specifies the risk adjustment factor for a patient who lives at home, has full benefits from both Medicare and Medicaid, and is enrolled in Medicare because of their age.

CommunityNonDualAged.description: Specifies the risk adjustment factor for a patient who lives at home, is covered only by Medicare, and is enrolled in Medicare because of their age.

CommunityNonDualDisabled.description: Specifies the risk adjustment factor for a patient who lives at home, is covered only by Medicare, and is enrolled in Medicare because of a disability.

Gender.description: Specifies the gender of the patient.

Institutional.description: Specifies the risk adjustment factor for a patient who lives at a healthcare facility.

IsActive.description: Indicates that the risk adjustment factors defined in the record are active.

IsDisabled.description: Indicates that the patient has a disability.

IsOriginallyDisabled.description: Indicates that patient was originally disabled.

LastReferencedDate.description: The date and time when the record was last referenced.

LastViewedDate.description: The date and time when the record was last viewed.

Name.description: The system-generated name of the record.

OwnerId.description: The owner of the record in the system.

ProgramType.description: Specifies the type of program that the risk adjustment factors are defined for.

PublishedYear.description: The year when the risk adjustment factors were published.
